QuestData.Title: Free the Pridelings
QuestData.Description: The trappers are rounding up all of the young wind riders. $n, will you go out there and free the pridelings?
QuestData.CompletionText: $n, would you please free more of the pridelings? I'd hate to see them enslaved to the Twilight's Hammer, or worse.
QuestData.RewardText: They're precious. One day they'll grow strong, but until then, they must be protected.
